diff_hunk:
@@ -70,11 +70,10 @@ html, body
     margin-top: 12px
     outline: none
     text-align: center
-    @media screen and (min-width: $screen-md)
+    @media screen and (min-width: $screen-sm)
       display: none
     i
       position: relative
-      top: 5px
body: if you are making changes to the styling of a specific `i` element for the menu only, I would suggest targeting that specific element. This removes the `top: 5px` from all icons across the whole site, and I'm not sure we want that.
